description.@en: You are trained to both to read and write at an alarmingly fast rate, which when combined with your lightning quick intellect, means you understand the written word quickly and easily and are able to replicate just as quickly and accurately.

effect.@en: You reduce the time required to use Education Tests by half (examples include research, speed-reading, writing, etc.). In addition, you automatically succeed at all Skill Tests to decipher cryptographs in languages they understand.
